patthana7.1:6.1: Nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā—
patthana7.1:6.2: akusalaṃ abyākataṃ ekaṃ khandhaṃ paṭicca akusalā abyākatā tayo khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ … pe … dve khandhe paṭicca dve khandhā cittasamuṭṭhānañca rūpaṃ.
patthana7.1:6.5: Nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana7.1:6.6: Nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana7.1:6.7: Nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo ca naabyākato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana7.1:6.8: Nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo ca naakusalo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … pañca.
patthana7.1:7.1: Naakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana7.1:7.2: Naakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana7.1:7.3: Naakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana7.1:7.4: Naakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naakusalo ca naabyākato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana7.1:7.5: Naakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo ca naakusalo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … pañca.
patthana7.1:8.1: Naabyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana7.1:8.2: Naabyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana7.1:8.3: Naabyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana7.1:8.4: Naabyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo ca naabyākato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana7.1:8.5: Naabyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naakusalo ca naabyākato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana7.1:8.6: Naabyākataṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo ca naakusalo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … cha.
patthana7.1:9.1: Nakusalañca naabyākatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana7.1:9.2: Nakusalañca naabyākatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana7.1:9.3: Nakusalañca naabyākatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana7.1:9.4: Nakusalañca naabyākatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo ca naabyākato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana7.1:9.5: Nakusalañca naabyākatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo ca naakusalo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … pañca.
patthana7.1:10.1: Naakusalañca naabyākatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana7.1:10.2: Naakusalañca naabyākatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana7.1:10.3: Naakusalañca naabyākatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana7.1:10.4: Naakusalañca naabyākatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca naakusalo ca naabyākato ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.
patthana7.1:10.5: Naakusalañca naabyākatañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo ca naakusalo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … pañca.
patthana7.1:11.1: Nakusalañca naakusalañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana7.1:11.2: Nakusalañca naakusalañca dhammaṃ paṭicca naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana7.1:11.3: Nakusalañca naakusalañca dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo ca naakusalo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
patthana7.1:12.1: Nakusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo dhammo uppajjati ārammaṇapaccayā.
patthana7.1:13.1: Hetuyā ekūnatiṃsa, ārammaṇe catuvīsa … pe … vipāke nava … pe … avigate ekūnatiṃsa.
patthana7.1:16.1: Nakusalo dhammo nakusalassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo … pe ….
patthana7.1:16.3: Nakusalo dhammo nakusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana7.1:16.4: Nakusalo dhammo naakusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana7.1:16.5: Nakusalo dhammo naabyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana7.1:16.6: Nakusalo dhammo nakusalassa ca naabyākatassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana7.1:16.7: Nakusalo dhammo naakusalassa ca naabyākatassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana7.1:16.8: Nakusalo dhammo nakusalassa ca naakusalassa ca dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … cha.
patthana7.1:17.1: Naakusalo dhammo naakusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … cha.
patthana7.1:18.1: Naabyākato dhammo naabyākatassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … cha.
patthana7.1:19.1: Nakusalo ca naabyākato ca dhammā nakusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … cha.
patthana7.1:20.1: Naakusalo ca naabyākato ca dhammā nakusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … cha.
patthana7.1:21.1: Nakusalo ca naakusalo ca dhammā nakusalassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo … cha.
patthana7.1:22.1: Nakusalo dhammo nakusalassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo … anantarapaccayena paccayo … samanantarapaccayena paccayo … sahajātapaccayena paccayo … aññamaññapaccayena paccayo … nissayapaccayena paccayo … upanissayapaccayena paccayo … purejātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana7.1:22.9: Nakusalo dhammo naakusalassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo … pe … nakusalo dhammo nakusalassa ca naakusalassa ca dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo … cha.
patthana7.1:23.1: Naakusalo dhammo naakusalassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana7.1:23.2: Naakusalo dhammo nakusalassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo … pe …
patthana7.1:23.4: naakusalo dhammo nakusalassa ca naakusalassa ca dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo … cha.
patthana7.1:24.1: Nakusalo ca naakusalo ca dhammā nakusalassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo.
patthana7.1:24.2: Nakusalo ca naakusalo ca dhammā naakusalassa dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo … pe … nakusalo ca naakusalo ca dhammā nakusalassa ca naakusalassa ca dhammassa purejātapaccayena paccayo … cha.
patthana7.1:25.1: Hetuyā ekūnatiṃsa, ārammaṇe chattiṃsa, adhipatiyā pañcatiṃsa, anantare catuttiṃsa, samanantare catuttiṃsa, sahajāte ekūnatiṃsa, aññamaññe catuvīsa, nissaye catuttiṃsa, upanissaye chattiṃsa, purejāte aṭṭhārasa, pacchājāte aṭṭhārasa, āsevane catuvīsa, kamme ekūnatiṃsa, vipāke nava, āhāre ekūnatiṃsa … pe … sampayutte catuvīsa, vippayutte sattavīsa … pe …
patthana7.1:26.1: (Yathā kusalattike pañhāvārassa anulomampi paccanīyampi anulomapaccanīyampi paccanīyānulomampi gaṇitaṃ evaṃ gaṇetabbaṃ.)
